name: Luxury Wedding Stage Decoration
description: This premium wedding stage decoration package features a fully customized floral design, imported backdrop drapes, LED lighting setup, and luxury seating arrangements. Perfect for modern weddings requiring a stunning centerpiece stage. Our expert decorators ensure a seamless, elegant, and personalized experience tailored to your theme.

name: Birthday Party Balloon Decoration
description: A colorful and vibrant balloon decoration package designed for both kids and adults. Includes balloon arch, backdrop, name board, cake table setup, and themed props. Perfect for home celebrations, restaurants, and event halls.

name: Corporate Event Decoration
description: Designed for product launches, award ceremonies, annual meetings, and corporate parties. Includes stage setup, branding banner, LED lights, sound optimization, and professional ambiance creation. Ensures a premium and business-class environment.

name: Mehndi Night Colorful Decoration
description: A vibrant mehndi program decoration featuring colorful drapes, fairy lights, flower umbrellas, and themed seating. Ideal for joyful family functions and outdoor celebrations.

name: Outdoor Garden Lighting Setup
description: Transform your garden or rooftop into a beautiful event venue with warm LED string lights, lanterns, pathway lights, and floral arrangements. Perfect for small weddings, engagements, and dinner parties.

name: Engagement Ceremony Premium Decor
description: Elegant engagement program decoration featuring premium flower backdrop, ring ceremony table, stage lights, and couple seating. Designed to create classy and romantic moments.

name: Haldi Ceremony Traditional Decor
description: Traditional yellow-themed Haldi decoration including marigold flowers, yellow drapes, flower props, and photo corners. A perfect setup for capturing beautiful memories.

name: Baby Shower Decoration
description: A gentle and elegant baby shower decoration with soft pastel balloons, backdrop, gender reveal props, and themed cake table setup. Ideal for home and banquet celebrations.

name: Anniversary Celebration Decor
description: Romantic anniversary decoration featuring LED numbers, heart-shaped balloon arch, candles, and flower arrangements. Perfect for surprises, parties, and private dinners.

name: Restaurant Event Decoration
description: Ideal for restaurant parties, family gatherings, corporate dinners, and private celebrations. Includes table decor, lighting, theme-based backdrop, and floor lights.

name: Luxury Floral Stage Setup
description: Premium floral stage design using imported fresh flowers, LED chandeliers, golden frames, and crystal decorations. Perfect for premium-class weddings and receptions.

name: Kids Birthday Theme Package
description: Theme-based decoration including cartoon props, character balloons, stage backdrop, and welcome arch. Themes available: Doraemon, Avengers, Frozen, Barbie, and more.

name: Romantic Surprise Room Decoration
description: Surprise your partner with a romantic room decoration including red balloons, LED lights, candles, rose petals, and heart-shaped props. Perfect for birthdays and anniversaries.

name: Corporate Branding Stage Setup
description: Full corporate event branding including banners, logo backdrops, LED screens, podium setup, and professional lighting. Ideal for conferences and annual meetings.

name: Cultural Event Decoration
description: Traditional cultural program decoration using colorful drapes, stage props, LED lights, and artistic designs. Best for school, college, and community programs.

name: Stage Lighting Premium Package
description: High-powered LED spotlights, colour wash lights, backdrop lighting, and stage glow effects for concerts, shows, and weddings.

name: Photo Booth Decoration
description: Modern themed photo booth with frames, flower walls, neon lights, and creative props. Perfect for weddings, birthdays, and corporate events.

name: Rooftop Night Light Setup
description: Warm LED lighting, star lights, lantern hanging, and elegant floral decor for romantic dinners, celebrations, and parties.

name: Full Wedding Decoration
description: Complete wedding solution including stage, entrance gate, mandap, mehndi, haldi, car decoration, walkway, floral designs, and lighting. Fully customizable.

name: Bachelor Party Decor
description: Fun and energetic bachelor party decoration including themed props, LED lights, smoke effects, and party backdrop setup.

name: Grand Entrance Gate Decoration
description: A luxurious entrance gate setup using floral arches, golden frames, welcome boards, fairy lights, and royal fabric drapes. Creates a stunning first impression for weddings, engagements, or receptions.

name: Premium Car Decoration
description: Beautiful bridal car decoration with imported fresh flowers, ribbons, LED strips, and customized name plates. Perfect for wedding day photoshoots.

name: VIP Guest Table Decoration
description: Elegant guest table setup with premium cloth, candles, fresh flowers, centerpiece props, and LED accent lights for weddings and corporate events.

name: School Annual Function Decoration
description: Creative stage decoration, theme banners, student photo booth, lighting, and trophies display area. Perfect for school or college cultural programs.

name: Neon Light Party Setup
description: Trendy neon theme setup using UV lights, custom neon text signs, glow balloons, and DJ-style background decor. Ideal for birthdays and bachelor parties.

name: Matrimonial Photo Zone
description: Premium flower wall, photo frames, fairy lights, and couple props designed for capturing beautiful wedding moments.

name: Small Home Event Decoration
description: Perfect for small home celebrations, includes subtle balloon setup, LED lights, and elegant fabric backdrop for birthday or surprise parties.

name: Luxury Mandap Decoration
description: A premium mandap design using traditional drapes, marigold flowers, seating stage, brass props, and LED spotlights. Perfect for Bangladeshi and Indian weddings.

name: Fireworks & Special Effects Setup
description: Cold fireworks, entry sparklers, fog machines, and indoor safe pyrotechnics to create dramatic effects for groom/bride entry.

name: Conference Hall Decoration
description: Professional backdrop, podium setup, table arrangements, projector screen framing, corporate lighting, and management branding.

name: Charity Event Decoration
description: Simple yet elegant event decoration including banners, photo corner, stage setup, sponsor branding, and light arrangement.

name: Summer Pool Party Decor
description: Colorful summer-themed decoration including floats, tropical balloons, palm props, neon boards, and outdoor lighting.

name: VIP Lounge Decoration
description: High-end lounge setup featuring luxury seating, coffee table styling, flower centerpiece, soft lights, and premium wall decor.

name: Stage Flower Shower Setup
description: Automatic flower shower machine for bride and groom entry, stage celebration, and photography moments. Includes fresh rose petals.

name: Corporate Product Launch Setup
description: High-tech LED backdrop, product display stands, stage lighting, branding design, and corporate booth decoration.

name: Candle Light Dinner Setup
description: Beautiful romantic dinner setup with candles, rose petals, fairy lights, table decor, and custom message board. Perfect for anniversaries or proposals.

name: Theme-Based Bridal Shower Decor
description: Elegant bridal shower setup using pastel themes, custom backdrops, fresh flowers, photo props, and luxury table decoration.

name: Vintage Themed Wedding Decor
description: Aesthetic vintage-themed wedding decoration featuring rustic wooden elements, lanterns, bronze frames, soft lighting, and elegant florals.

name: Romantic Proposal Setup
description: Heart-shaped backdrop, candle walkway, rose petals, LED marquee letters, and photo zone. Perfect for surprise proposals.

name: Festival Decoration Package
description: Eid, Puja, Pohela Boishakh, and other festival-themed decoration including colorful props, banners, lights, and traditional art pieces.
